title: 'Whitewashing brutal raids': BJP flays Cong over ex-VP Ansari calling Ghazni 'Indian'
content: BJP storngly condemned former Vice President Hamid Ansari for his remarks who called Mahmud Ghazni as an Indian. In a social media post, BJP spokesperson C Kesavan said that the remarks were ‚Äúshocking‚Äù and recalled that Ansari had been the Congress-led UPA‚Äôs choice for Vice President twice. Shehzad Poonawala, also attacked the Congress party.

title: Magh Mela row: Seer ups the ante, makes 2 big demands; asks CM to prove he is 'Hindu sympathiser'
content: Swami Avimukteshwaranand Saraswati has asked UP CM  Yogi Adityanath to stop beef exports from the state and declare the cow as ‚ÄòRajya Mata‚Äô. He emphasized that such steps would prove the chief minister‚Äôs commitment as a ‚ÄúHindu sympathiser‚Äù. The seer further stated that  he had staged a sit-in protest for 11 days after the incident but left the Magh Mela ground last Wednesday ‚Äúwith a heavy heart‚Äù.

title: Australian Open: The agony of being Zverev in the age of Carlos Alcaraz
content: Most non-athletes wouldn‚Äôt last in a cage, ring, or court with a professional. But even amongst professional athletes, there‚Äôs a rare breed that has access to a metaphorical place their less hallowed peers wish they could reach. They operate at a level that even fellow professionals fail to comprehend. It‚Äôs both mental and physical.

title: Amazon HR head's 'message' for employees on layoffs: As we always have, every team will‚Ä¶
content: Amazon HR chief Beth Galetti told employees the company won't announce mass layoffs every few months‚Äîthough individual teams will keep making staffing "adjustments as appropriate." The careful wording follows 16,000 job cuts earlier this week and 14,000 in October last year. Company's top leadership framed the job cuts as part of CEO Andy Jassy's push to operate like the "world's largest startup," suggesting ongoing changes despite promises of no regular cuts.

title: Russia‚ÄìIndia talks on Su-57: what is on the table, and what the fighter really offers
content: India and Russia are in advanced technical talks for joint production of the Su-57 fifth-generation fighter jet. This potential collaboration, focusing on licensed production of the export variant, revives past discussions. The Su-57 offers impressive maneuverability and long-range weapons, but its stealth capabilities and engine development are key considerations for India's future air combat fleet and indigenous AMCA program.

title: 47% for defence, Rs 197 crore expenditure: A look at India‚Äôs first Budget in 1947
content: India's budgetary journey began with the first Union Budget presented on November 26, 1947, amidst the trauma of Partition and economic uncertainty. This interim budget focused on relief, rehabilitation, and defence, reflecting the nation's immediate challenges. Today, the Union Budget is a detailed roadmap for a rapidly growing economy, showcasing India's significant economic evolution.

title: Apple CEO Tim Cook answers why Google, not Sam Altman's OpenAI, won the race for Siri
content: Apple has chosen Google's advanced Gemini AI for its new Siri and upcoming Apple Intelligence features, prioritizing superior technology over OpenAI. CEO Tim Cook emphasized this collaboration, assuring users of continued privacy standards. While OpenAI's ChatGPT integration remains, it's now seen as secondary. Apple views this AI integration as a significant value creator and potential revenue stream.

title: BMW X3 30 xDrive M Sport Pro specs revealed: 20-inch wheels, 258 hp & more
content: The SUV retains features offered on other X3 variants, including a 12.3-inch digital instrument display, a 14.9-inch touchscreen infotainment system, a head-up display (HUD), a head-up display, a 15-speaker Harman Kardon audio system, wireless phone charging, a panoramic sunroof, a powered tailgate, powered and ventilated front seats with memory function and more.

title: T20 World Cup: ICC reveals umpires for 'crunch' India-Pakistan match in Colombo
content: Nitin Menon will officiate in his fourth T20 World Cup, while Anantha Padmanabhan makes his debut at an ICC event. Menon is set to reach 150 international matches as an on-field umpire. Kumar Dharmasena, a veteran, will also be officiating, having already stood in 37 T20 World Cup matches.

title: Google co-founder Sergey Brin makes his largest single public donation ever
content: Google co-founder Sergey Brin has made his largest public donation, contributing $20 million to a new coalition, 'Building a Better California,' to address the state's housing crisis. This significant contribution makes him the anchor donor for a $35 million launch package, joined by other tech leaders. The donation occurs as California billionaires prepare for a potential wealth tax initiative.

title: 'Menstrual health a Fundamental Right': SC makes landmark ruling - 3 key orders explained
content: The Supreme Court has declared menstrual hygiene a constitutional right under Article 21, mandating free sanitary pads and separate toilets for girls in all schools. This ruling ensures dignity and equality, holding both government and private institutions accountable for compliance. The judgment stems from concerns over "period-shaming" incidents.

title: B'desh polls: US issues security alert; warns of political violence, 'extremist attacks'
content: The US embassy in Bangladesh has issued a security alert for its citizens ahead of the February 12 parliamentary elections, warning of potential political violence and extremist attacks. Americans are advised to remain vigilant, avoid large gatherings, and monitor local news due to anticipated transportation restrictions and a history of pre-election unrest.

title: Thierry Henry and Andrea Rajacic net worth, wealth and love story
content: Thierry Henry became a football legend with clubs like Arsenal and Barcelona, then stayed in the game as a coach and TV expert. By early 2026, his net worth is estimated around $125‚Äì135 million. His long-time partner Andrea Rajacic, who works in fashion, has her own income. Together, they share a quiet family life and a combin

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $35M Cubs star as Robert Suarez emerges key asset
content: A hypothetical trade sees the Atlanta Braves acquiring versatile infielder Nico Hoerner from the Chicago Cubs for hard-throwing reliever Robert Suarez. This move addresses Atlanta's infield void due to injury, while Chicago secures a much-needed closer. Both players are in their prime with multi-year control, making it a balanced, win-now exchange.

title: 'I needed to let him go': Gabrielle Union on almost ending marriage with Dwyane Wade
content: Dwyane Wade and his wife, the popular actress Gabrielle Union, have had a beautiful and a healthy marriage ever since they tied the knot in 2014 after dating for a couple of years. While both Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union had been through divorce before, the popular actress did not have a biological child of her own unlike the NBA legend. As the two tried to expand their family, Gabrielle Union details the trauma she faced as she failed to conceive.

title: ‚ÄòPersonal request‚Äô: Moscow agrees to Trump's call to pause Kyiv strikes until Feb 1
content: Moscow has agreed to a one-week pause in strikes on Kyiv, until February 1, following a personal request from US President Donald Trump. The Kremlin stated the move aims to facilitate negotiations, while Trump cited extreme cold as his reason. Ukraine's President Zelenskyy welcomed the announcement, pledging reciprocal restraint if Russia refrains from attacking energy infrastructure.

title: Maxx Crosby Shares Honest Take on Seahawks WR Jaxon Smith-Njigba
content: Maxx Crosby favors Sam Darnold over Drake Maye, praising Jaxon Smith-Njigba's explosive 2025 season.  The Seahawks' front office recognized Smith-Njigba's talent, leading to DK Metcalf's trade to Pittsburgh and Tyler Lockett's move to Tennessee. Lockett later sought release from the Titans and is slated to join Crosby's Raiders in 2026.

title: Jana Nayagan censor row as CBFC moves Supreme Court release delayed
content: The CBFC has approached the Supreme Court regarding the censor row for Thalapathy Vijay's film 'Jana Nayagan', pushing its release further. After a single judge favored producers for immediate certification, the CBFC challenged this, leading the Madras High Court's division bench to order a fresh hearing. The film's release is now entirely dependent on court outcomes.

title: Kolkata godown fire: PM Modi condoles deaths in Anandapur mishap; announces Rs 2 lakh ex-gratia
content: A devastating fire in Kolkata's Anandapur area has claimed at least 11 lives, with many still missing. Prime Minister Modi announced ex-gratia payments for victims. Investigations reveal potential fire safety lapses at the godowns, with authorities probing the exact cause and legal action planned against owners. Relatives anxiously await news.

title: Visa mistakes: I selected 'wrong' Korea in US visa form and this is happened
content: A routine US visa renewal turned into an unexpected interview for one applicant due to a simple dropdown menu error. Mistaking South Korea for North Korea in the application led to a 'refused' status and a mandatory embassy visit. The mix-up, common due to similar country names, was clarified, resulting in visa approval, highlighting the importance of meticulous form completion.

title: India's coach offered to resign after senior player's exclusion over 'indiscipline'
content: Chief coach Craig Fulton reportedly threatened to resign over Manpreet Singh's exclusion from core hockey probables on disciplinary grounds, viewing it as "external interference." Fulton advocated for the veteran midfielder's inclusion, citing his fitness and mentorship role. Hockey India officials, however, maintained Manpreet sought rest, leading to his omission.

title: Brutal selloff! Gold, silver prices crash in volatile session - what‚Äôs causing the dip?
content: After an exhilarating rally in the recent sessions, gold and silver futures took a nosedive on Friday as traders took the opportunity to cash in on their gains. The drop, spurred by a robust US dollar and shifting global market sentiments, led to notable declines across both domestic and international exchanges.

title: 'From 0 to 64 lakh': Shah attacks Cong over infiltrators in poll-bound Assam
content: Union home minister Amit Shah accused the Congress of altering Assam's demography, claiming infiltrator numbers rose significantly during their rule. He urged voters to elect the BJP for a third term to combat infiltration and protect the state's identity, highlighting the Mising community's role in this effort.

title: ‚ÄòPakistani-yo ki choti choti khushiya‚Äô: Jadeja's sharp dig at Pakistan PM's X post
content: Former cricketer Ajay Jadeja sparked a debate by criticising Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif's celebratory tweet after Pakistan's T20I win against Australia. Jadeja's remark highlighted the perceived over-celebration of a bilateral series opener.

title: Unarmed combat, hostage crisis and more: What Delhi Police SWAT commandos are trained for
content: A 27-year-old pregnant SWAT commando with Delhi Police's Special Cell has died after allegedly being attacked by her husband. The elite commando, trained for high-risk operations including hostage rescue and VVIP security, was four months pregnant at the time of the incident. The investigation into her death is ongoing.

title: 'Border 2' vs 'Mardaani 3': Sunny Deol film faces competition from Rani Mukerji starrer
content: 'Border 2' has had a strong box office run, crossing Rs 200 crore thanks to its Republic Day release. Despite an initial surge, the film saw a significant drop in numbers, further impacted by the release of 'Mardaani 3'. 'Border 2' has now collected a total of Rs 225.36 crore.

title: 'Angoor khate hai': Goyal rips into 'negative mindset' of Cong; pans UPA-era FTA deals
content: Union minister Piyush Goyal defended the India-EU FTA, dismissing Congress criticism as 'sour grapes' and highlighting the party's past inaction. He accused Congress of endangering India's interests by pushing for China-centric trade pacts, contrasting it with the current government's balanced approach. Goyal also lauded India's economic growth and the FTA's geopolitical significance.

title: Carlos Alcaraz outlasts Alexander Zverev in five-set epic to reach maiden Australian Open final
content: Carlos Alcaraz battled through injury and a dramatic momentum shift to defeat Alexander Zverev in a thrilling five-set Australian Open semifinal. The young Spaniard, despite physical distress, secured his spot in the final, becoming the youngest man to reach all four Grand Slam finals. He now stands one win away from a historic career Grand Slam.

title: Kuwait-Delhi flight carrying 180 passengers diverted to Ahmedabad following bomb threat
content: An IndiGo flight from Kuwait to Delhi was diverted to Ahmedabad this morning after a bomb threat. The aircraft landed safely with 180 passengers. A handwritten note claiming a bomb was on board prompted the diversion. All passengers were evacuated safely. Security personnel conducted a thorough search. No suspicious objects were found.

title: Budget 2026: Press meets, reels & more ‚Äî BJP rolls out nationwide 'Outreach Campaign'
content: The BJP is launching a nationwide outreach campaign from February 1-15 to explain the Union Budget 2026, utilizing both traditional and digital outreach. Ministers and leaders will address press conferences at nearly 150 locations. Meanwhile, MDMK leader Vaiko has accused the BJP government of discriminating against Tamil Nadu and attempting to impose Hindi, vowing strong resistance.

title: Jail terms & seclusion: How Pakistan has perfected the art of silencing dissent
content: Pakistan intensifies legal actions against Imran Khan and activists, citing national security. Critics fear shrinking democratic space amid military influence, as prison visits are restricted and lawyers face lengthy sentences for alleged anti-state content. Officials maintain these are lawful measures against destabilization, not dissent suppression.

title: 'Only 50-over is the real one': Manjrekar questions T20 World Cup's credibility
content: As the T20 World Cup approaches, former India batter Sanjay Manjrekar argues it shouldn't hold the same prestige as the 50-over World Cup. He believes the original four-year cycle of the ODI event grants it a unique legacy, a sentiment echoed by Rohit Sharma's deep reverence for the 50-over format.

title: 'Strong voice against communalism': Tharoor praises Rahul; what he said on differences with party
content: Senior Congress leader Shashi Tharoor has dismissed speculation of a rift within the party, projecting unity after meeting with Rahul Gandhi and Mallikarjun Kharge. The MP affirmed his commitment to the party and stated he would not leave, emphasising his intention to campaign extensively in Kerala for the upcoming assembly polls.

title: Woman elopes with lover 3 months after wedding; husband, her brother-in-law die by suicide
content: A newlywed man died by suicide after his wife eloped with her lover. The woman's brother-in-law also took his life upon learning of the incident. A suicide note from the first victim alleged false accusations and threats from his wife's family.

title: Tony Stewart‚Äôs Daytona comeback faces unexpected heat from Jimmie Johnson‚Äôs cup
content: The Cup Series‚Äô Daytona 500 is the most anticipated NASCAR race of the year. But with drivers like Tony Stewart stepping in, the Truck Series seems to be leaving a bigger impression. John Hunter Nemechek has recorded a few top-10 finishes with Legacy Motor Club over the past two years.  "I‚Äôm looking forward to making the most of this opportunity and having a strong run with the support of HFR and DriveValue.com.‚Äù

title: Asian Shooting C'ships | ‚ÄòPlaying in Delhi has its challenges‚Äô: Sangwan chases ‚Äòmissing‚Äô gold
content: Rhythm Sangwan, a 22-year-old shooter, acknowledged the pressure of competing at home in the upcoming Asian Rifle and Pistol Shooting Championship in New Delhi. Despite winning three medals in 2024, an Asian Championship gold remains elusive. Sangwan emphasised on focusing on her process rather than past results or future medal forecasts.

title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz S-Class luxury sedan revealed: Seven screens, V8 and more!
content: In addition to the standard S-Class, Mercedes-Benz will also offer AMG and AMG Line Plus trims with sportier styling elements, along with the armoured Mercedes-Benz S 680 GUARD 4MATIC. The GUARD 4MATIC uses the brand‚Äôs in-house Integrated Protection System (iSS), which combines a purpose-built protective cell with a discreet aluminium exterior, along with a reworked chassis. This setup enables the vehicle to meet VR10 standards, the highest level of civilian ballistic protection.

title: Karnataka Congress video hails ‚Äòbrand DK Shivakumar‚Äô as power tussle with Siddaramaiah simmers
content: Amidst Karnataka's Congress power tussle, the party highlighted Deputy CM D.K. Shivakumar with a social media video, calling him a "brand." This follows an incident where CM Siddaramaiah expressed irritation over pro-Shivakumar slogans at a rally, underscoring ongoing internal friction despite assurances of party high command's decisions.

title: Vonn crashes, limps off in last pre-Olympics run
content: Lindsey Vonn crashed in her final downhill Friday before the Milan Cortina Olympics and was left limping and keeping weight off her left knee.

title: One for ages: Flagg nets 49; Knueppel scores win
content: Kon Knueppel made the critical plays down the stretch, outdueling Cooper Flagg, his former roommate at Duke who led all scorers with 49 points, and helping the Hornets past the Mavericks for their fifth straight win.

title: Alcaraz outlasts Zverev in 5.5 hour epic match
content: Carlos Alcaraz overcame possible cramps and injury to fend off Alexander Zverev in an epic, momentum-swinging five-setter Friday, becoming the youngest man in the Open era to reach the finals of all four Grand Slam events.

title: Brady touts Coleman: 'Stood on the table' for WR
content: New Bills coach Joe Brady expressed his support for wide receiver Keon Coleman, stating that "Keon Coleman is going to be a Buffalo Bill."

title: Kane passes Modano, sets U.S.-born points mark
content: Patrick Kane passed Mike Modano on Thursday night to become the highest-scoring U.S.-born player in NHL history.

title: Bills' Allen has surgery, expects quick recovery
content: Bills quarterback Josh Allen says he expects to be ready for OTAs after having foot surgery this week.

content: It took two years of convincing, but Kawhi Leonard's new game is supercharging the Clippers -- and making them an unexpected threat in the loaded Western Conference.

content: The NFL has stood by its decision to book Bad Bunny for the Super Bowl halftime show, despite Trump administration criticism.

content: A lot has changed since his last fight, but a late-career lingering UFC narrative remains a constant.

title: Teofimo Lopez Jr., Shakur Stevenson went from spar...
content: In 2016, Shakur Stevenson and Teofimo Lopez Jr. sparred at a Miami gym. On Saturday, they fight for much more.

title: Copy of How MLS' USMNTers endure long offseason to stay sh...
content: This summer's World Cup will be the pinnacle for many USMNT players. For those in MLS, will the long winter offseason complicate their preparation?

title: Copy of Copy of Transfer rumors, news: Tottenham eye ex-Arsenal st...
content: Tottenham Hotspur are in the market for a new winger and have made contact over Bayern Munich's Serge Gnabry. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: CID Begins Probe Into Baramati Plane Crash That Killed Ajit Pawar
content: The Maharashtra Crime Investigation Department (CID) has started its probe into the plane crash in Baramati that killed Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar and four others, an official said on Friday.

title: Ambuja Cements Profit Soars 258% In Quarter 3 On Record Quarterly Volume
content: Adani Group's Ambuja Cements on Friday posted strong results for the October-December quarter (Q3 FY26), with net profit surging 258 per cent year-on-year at Rs 3,781 crore with highest-ever quarterly volume at 18.9 million tonnes, up 17 per cent.

title: Congress, BJP Clash As OBC Reservation Hearing Deferred Yet Again
content: The Congress accused the BJP of deliberately delaying the case to deny OBCs their constitutional rights, while the BJP hit back, alleging a conspiracy to mislead the OBC community with "false narratives".

title: BJP Tries Very Hard, Doesn't Get Tamil Nadu: Karti Chidambaram To NDTV
content: The Congress adds a secular sheen to the DMK-led alliance, said Congress MP Karti Chidambaram, admitting that the party is not in any position to face elections alone in Tamil Nadu.

title: Spacesuit To Lab Coat, Shubhanshu Shukla's Mars Experiment Takes Off
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla's new avatar is ready. Apart from being an astronaut and the first Indian to fly to the International Space Station (ISS), he is also a scientist now.

title: Israel Acknowledges Over 70,000 Palestinians Died Since Start Of 2023 War
content: Israel has for the first time acknowledged that the data on fatalities released by the Gaza Health Ministry since the October 7, 2023 attack carried out by Hamas launched a full-blown war between the two sides.

title: India Nominates Meghalaya's Living Root Bridges For UNESCO Heritage Site
content: India has submitted to UNESCO in Paris the nomination dossier of Meghalaya's living root bridges for consideration to include in the World Heritage list 2026-27, Chief Minister Conrad K Sangma said on Thursday.

title: 'Maha Rudra Puja' In Rameshwaram To Launch Art Of Living's 45th Anniversary
content: Spiritual organisation The Art of Living is set to celebrate its 45th anniversary with a landmark event. The Somnath Jyotirling Maha Rudra Puja, a rare and powerful Vedic ceremony, will be held in the presence of Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.

title: Why A Canadian Separatist Group Wants Trump's Help To Split From The Country
content: A separatist group in Canada called the Alberta Prosperity Project (APP) has received approval to collect signatures in support of a referendum seeking to make the western province an independent country.

title: Court Rejects Bail Plea Of 3 Accused In Zubeen Garg's Death Case
content: A court here on Friday rejected the bail petitions of three of the accused in Zubeen Garg's death case, with the singer's wife pleading that bail should not be granted to any of them till the case is closed.

title: "Dangerous Question": Trump's Quip When Asked About Life Without Melania
content: US President Donald Trump, his wife Melania Trump and other top members of his administration were at the John F Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts to attend the premiere of the documentary "Melania".

title: Kevin Warsh, Ex-Federal Reserve Official, Picked By Trump As Next Chair Of Fed
content: US President Donald Trump said on Friday that he will nominate former Federal Reserve official Kevin Warsh as the next chair of the Fed. After current chair Jerome Powell's term expires in May, Warsh would replace him.

title: Morning Walk Turns Into Nightmare As Neighbour's Dog Mauls Bengaluru Woman
content: The dog reportedly attacked without provocation, biting her on the neck. When a man rushed to her rescue, the dog turned on him as well.

title: Stepfathers Kill Stepsons In Delhi-NCR In Two Separate Incidents
content: The Delhi-National Capital Region has been shaken by two separate, horrific incidents of domestic violence in which stepfathers allegedly murdered their young stepsons.

title: Opinion: Book Review | 'Tell My Mother I Like Boys': Chef Suvir Saran Tells His Boldest Story Yet
content: 'Tell My Mother I Like Boys' is not a typical chef memoir. It is not a coming-out manifesto. It is not a voyeuristic celebrity tell-all. It is something far more intimate: a life examined honestly.

title: Watch: 'Batman' Confronts California City Council Over ICE Super Bowl Plan
content: A man dressed as Batman berated officials in the California city set to host the Super Bowl next month over claims they could let ICE officers patrol the NFL championship game.

title: "Karur Tragedy Was A Shocker, Took Time To Recoup": TVK Leader To NDTV
content: Superstar Vijay's Tamilaga Vettri Kazhagam (TVK) party will form the government in Tamil Nadu, a senior leader has asserted, ruling out concerns that the Karur stampede and the Jana Nayagan controversy would impact the party's election prospects.

title: Huge Row Over Punjab Ex Chief Minister's "Bomb" Comment In Podcast
content: A comment by former Punjab chief minister Rajinder Kaur Bhattal in a podcast has created ripples in Punjab's politics. Bhattal alleged that while she was chief minister, some officials asked her to orchestrate bomb blasts to stay in power.

title: Kremlin Confirms Trump's "Personal Request" To Halt Kyiv Strikes Till Feb 1
content: US President Donald Trump asked Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin to halt strikes on Kyiv for a week "until February 1", the Kremlin said Friday, without mentioning when the request was made.

title: Why The Wests Pivot To Beijing Is No Fix For Trumps Trade War
content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer's visit to China is the latest win Beijing can tout in its rivalry with Washington, but the deals he brings back to London also show the limits of the balancing act that middle powers may try to play.

title: 'Disrespected northeast by not wearing gamosa': Shah blasts Rahul in poll-bound Assam
content:
NEW DELHI: Union home minister in a public address in Assam's Dibrugarh launched scathing attacks at Congress and Rahul Gandhi. Accusing the LoP of disrespecting the state's culture, the home minister blamed him for the violence and chaos in Assam. Addressing the public rally in poll-bound Assam, Shah said, "Rahul Gandhi (was the) only person during the President's At Home event to not wear Assam's gamosa... I want to ask Congress, Rahul Gandhi did not wear Assam's gamosa. Everyone present at the President's house, including the international guests, wore it. What enmity does Rahul Gandhi have with the northeast? BJP won't allow insult of region's culture. "

Gamosa Controversy Explained: BJP Criticizes Rahul Gandhi At President‚ÄôS ‚ÄòAt Home‚Äô Event

content: CPI(M) is serious and open-minded about any proposal that will resolve the State‚Äôs connectivity issue, says party State secretary M.V. Govindan

content: Minister for Local Self-Governments M.B. Rajesh says BJP State president Rajeev Chandrasekhar and Leader of the Opposition V.D. Satheesan should clarify whether they still hold their earlier opinion of the EPEP as a mere publicity stunt

title: Budget dashes hope of Idukki‚Äôs cardamom farmers
content: Despite expectations of special projects and dedicated fund allocations to strengthen the industry, the crop was not even mentioned by name in the Budget

title: Diaspora key to Kerala‚Äôs development: Chief Minister
content: Inaugurating the fifth Loka Kerala Sabha,  Pinarayi says both resident and non-resident Keralites play an equally important role in shaping Kerala‚Äôs society, culture and future

title: Yatnal asks Congress to respond to contractors‚Äô ‚Äòdoubling commission‚Äô charge
content: Siddaramaiah has become the longest-serving Chief Minister of Karnataka after surpassing the tenure of Devaraj Urs, and he should leave office with a clean record, says the expelled BJP member

title: Information Commission completes key audit, submits annual reports
content: Pendency of complaints and second appeals at the Commission stands at nearly 15,000, with over 7,000 disposed in the last six months

content: Party leader T. Harish Rao says irrigation authorities attending a meeting in Delhi despite setting condition for stopping DPR preparation

content: The Budget ignored the persistent demand for an agricultural package for the district, even as it considered Kasaragod, Idukki, Wayanad, and Kuttanad

content: General Education Minister V. Sivankutty says Satheesan‚Äôs refusal to contest the Assembly elections from Nemom constituency is another tangible evidence of the strengthening Congress-BJP ties in the State¬†

title: A country that isolated itself and built thousands of hidden bunkers
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. title: Eagles hire Packers QB coach Mannion as OC
content: the Eagles are hiring Sean Mannion as their offensive coordinator . the 33-year-old has coached for just two years, breaking in as an offensive assistant for the Green Bay Packers in 2024 . he was promoted to quarterbacks coach this past season .

title: Sources: Cunningham set to become Falcons' GM
content: the Atlanta Falcons hired former assistant general manager Ian Cunningham as their new GM . the 40-year-old joins president of football Matt Ryan and coach Kevin Stefanski . "his vision for our team aligned exactly with the type of leader we were seeking to help take the Falcons to the next level," Ryan says .
